name: Ultroloth
lore: Ultroloths serve as the generals and overlords of yugoloth armies, commanding legions of lesser fiends in campaigns across the Lower Planes. They are cunning manipulators, capable of weaving intricate plots and bending others to their will. An ultroloth's hypnotic gaze can stun even strong-willed foes, and its mastery of dark magic makes it a fearsome adversary. These fiends trade their services to archdevils and demon lords alike, always negotiating the best terms for themselves.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The ultroloth has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

multiattack.description: The ultroloth makes two Enervating Longsword attacks and uses Hypnotic Gaze.

actions.name: Enervating Longsword
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Hypnotic Gaze
actions.description: The ultroloth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target makes a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target has the Charmed condition until the start of the ultroloth's next turn. While Charmed in this way, the target also has the Stunned condition.

savingThrow.targets: one creature the ultroloth can see within 30 feet

conditions.duration: until the start of the ultroloth's next turn
until the start of the ultroloth's next turn

onFailure.effects: While Charmed in this way, the target also has the Stunned condition.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description: The ultroloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components. Spell save DC 18. At will: Alter Self, Darkness, Detect Thoughts, Disguise Self, Invisibility (self only). 3/day each: Dimension Door, Fireball, Wall of Fire.

bonusActions.name: Teleport
bonusActions.description: The ultroloth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
